<title level="1" right="Trait">[City](/Traits.aspx?ID=273)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 250</row>

Settlements with this trait tend to be relatively large, with levels typically ranging from 5 to 7.
